K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-6: skye bo mang po dang par byed pa'i spyod lam gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;kun nas mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-7: rgyun mi 'chad par bltas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-8: gom pa 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-9: spyod lam ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-10: spyod lam ma bcos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-11: 'di dag ni spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-12: de la phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-13: spyod pa yang par zang zing len pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-14: sems can ma rungs ba dag la skyabs byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-15: mu stegs can rnams kyi gnod pa gzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-16: 'di ltar gdul kha'i phyir dga' bo lta'i nang du son pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-17: 'di ltar pad ma'i snying po'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149a-18: gdul ba'i phyir bzang brtsams sgom pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-0: 'di ltar @149b lnga pa'i nang nas kun shes snying rjes nye bar 'ongs te chos bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-1: 'di ltar bden pa blta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-2: 'di dag ni phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-3: de la nyon mongs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-4: nyon mongs pas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-5: dbang rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-6: gnod sems med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-7: mos pa la yon spyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-8: mngon par zhen pa med par rtag tu sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-9: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-10: 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa yid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-11: de la che'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-12: tshe 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-13: bor nas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-14: mtshams bcad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-15: lta bar song ba'i srid pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-16: sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir gtang ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:149b-17: sems can yin byung pa rnams gdul ba'i phyir btang pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-0: 'di dag ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug @150a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-2: de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-3: len pa med par mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-4: sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-5: 'od srung chen po mthong bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-6: stong gsum g-yo bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-7: sems la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-8: ring bsrel sel bud blags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-9: 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-10: de la cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-11: phyogs tha dad pa dag tu sku gdung rnams 'thor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-12: sku gdung gi cho 'phrul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-13: sems can rnams dang bar phyed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-14: cho 'phrul la lta rnams spro bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-15: spu zing zhes byed cing mchi ma 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-16: bden pa'i chog gis ring bsrel las cho 'phrul 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-17: 'di dag ni cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150a-18: de la bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-0: rnyed ba rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin @150b pa'i 'o; ;kha na mtho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-1: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-2: ji tsam du lta dang mis bstan pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-3: bdud kyis bltar med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-4: bstan pa dang bral bar dga' zhing dang btsam gyis mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-5: 'di dag ni bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-6: de la ring bsrel rnam par dbye ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-7: ring bsrel rnams la yo byad kyis mtshed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-8: skye bo mang po dad pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-9: ring bsrel gyi mchod rten gzi byin can gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-10: lha dang mi rnams dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-11: ring bsrel gyi dmigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-12: ring bsrel tshol bas spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-13: 'di dag ni ring bsrel rnam par dbye pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:150b-14: de dag las pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-0: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la @151a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni gti mug spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-4: de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong bzhi brgya 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-5: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kyang brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-6: de dag gi rnam pa la 'jug pa'ang stong stong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-7: rnam pa brgya brgya po re re'i stong stong po des na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-8: de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-9: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong sgrub par byed pa ni bdag la phan par brtson pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-10: gzungs brgyad khri bzhi stong ni gzhan sa phan par brtson pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-12: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po; nges byang chub kyi snying por bdud pa tul te byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de chos la dga' ba'i rnam par smin pas zhag bdun gyi bar du dkyil mo krung ma bshig par 'dug pa la tshangs pas kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di na cha ba 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-13: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas na chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang thugs las chud du la thugs mngon par gzhol bar mdzad kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151a-14: chos bstan pa'i slad du ni ma lags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-0: de nas nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug pa'i @151b dpal dang gzi brjid dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-1: kha dog dang tshul bzang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-2: kha dog du ma snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-3: sku drang por bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-5: tha dad du 'gro bar 'ongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-8: 'od kyi kha dog mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-10: bkod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-11: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-12: bkod pa yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-13: ye shes kyi bdag nyid chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-15: gzi byin mtha' yas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-17: mkhyen bzhin du kha dog mdzes par snang ba dag kyang mthong nas de'i tshe spyan sngar 'khod de zhes dang bcas pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-18: bdud btul nyon mongs pa dag rnam bcom zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-19: stong gsum po'i sa gzhig yo mdzad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-20: ngan song sa yi sdug bsngal spangs nas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-21: byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa kun du mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-22: lhun po ri dang 'dra bar mi g-yo bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-23: drang po'i sku yis bde bar bzhugs mdzad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-24: zhing rnams kun du 'od zer 'gyed mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-25: mgon po shing dbang drung na lhang nger bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-26: skyil mo krung mchog mnyam bzhag dbang po yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-27: sengge lta bu mi g-yo ba zhugs mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-28: gong na med par bdag nyid gzigs pa na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:151b-29: mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan la lhang der bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-1: song srog chags sdug bsngal zhe mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-2: mtho ris lam dag rgya cher mdzad pa na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-3: 'jig rten las ni 'dod pa zhi mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-4: sva la'i mchog dbang drung na lhang der bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-5: sbyor mnyam mnyam pa nyid kyis bzhugs mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-6: 'jig rten phan par bden tshul dgongs pa po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-7: bden pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa dgongs pa na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-8: mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan la lhang nger bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-9: dus gsum chos kyi de nyid dgongs mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-10: 'gro ba tshogs gsum dag tu mdzad pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-11: bstan pa dgongs tshe dus shes 'di dag ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-12: thugs chud gsung pa zla ba lhang der bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-13: sems can mkhas pa 'jig rten dam pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-14: sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan pa gzugs mchog mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-15: drang srong chen po 'jig rten mi sdug pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-16: tshangs pa yi chad dngos kyis nyer mchis na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-17: me gsum lhung ba'i 'jig rten gzigs su gsol; ;khyod kyis byang chub yan lag grus bstan gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-18: mgon po byang chub yan lag bdun ston pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-19: khyod gyis bdud rtsi'i char dbab dus 'di lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-20: 'du shes log pa long ba rab nyams pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-21: skye rgu bdud lam gnas pa gzigs su gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152a-22: ston khyod mig ldan gzhan du mi 'gyur ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-0: khyod kyis dus 'dir thugs @152b rje bskyed du gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-1: mu stegs ngan 'gro g-yang sa chen po yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-2: srid pa'i rgya mtshos skye dgu 'di khyer rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-3: sems can srid mtsho las 'don 'gro ba'i don //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-4: mdzad pas byang chub yan lag grus kyang bsgral //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-5: 'jig tshogs ltas bcings skye dgu 'di dag rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-6: lta bas gnod byas srid pa'i khol po dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-7: yun ring bgags pa bcings las thar ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-8: sems can kha sgyur ci slad grol mi mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-9: nyon mongs dbang gis log par rab bsong la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-10: yun ring gnyid log sgrib pas khebs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-11: tshul khrims brtul shugs bstan pa'i ting 'dzin 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-12: chos kyi rnga sgra ci slad bsgrags mi bgyid //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-13: 'jig rten dag na dbul gyur 'gro ba'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-14: 'gro lnga re thag chang slong zhugs la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-15: khyod kyis nor bdun di ring bsnyes gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-16: mchod sbyin dam pa ci slad de mi stsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-17: bdud rtsi med pa'i sems can stong pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-18: dad pa phal chen sa bon 'dzin mchis na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-19: rnam grol glog dang thugs rje'i char sprin las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-20: ci slad byang chub yan lag chang mi dbab /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-21: zug rngus zug pa'i nad pa khams gsum na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-22: nyon mongs nyam thag nang snying zas phongs la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-23: byang chub yan lag sman mchog brnyes pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:152b-24: nad pa yun ring deng ci grol mi mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-0: mun pa mun nag zhugs pa'i 'gro @153a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-2: gti mug bsgribs pa mya ngan chen po'i nang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-3: stong chen shes rab mar mes mun chen po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-4: bzod brlag ci yi slad du sel mi mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-5: 'dam rdzab chu bo bzhin yongs skyo ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-6: skye bo g-yang sa chen por lhung 'di dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-7: lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad thugs rtse ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-8: mgon pos de ni ci slad gdon mi bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-9: lta la chags pa'i mu stegs phal chen gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-10: lha mi kun tu glongs par mchis rnams la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-11: drang po ma yo gyo med pa de ba yis; ;ci slad rin chen lam dgang mi bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-12: mi dbang sengge la ni tshangs gsol pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-13: rdzogs sangs rgyas spyan 'jig rten gsum la gzigs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-14: gzigs nas sems can rnams la brtse bskyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-15: nad med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-16: lha de dag gis da ltar brtags nas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-17: byang chub snying por seng gdan nga 'dug la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-18: bstod de bstod nas de ltar dga' bas dong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:153a-19: ngas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-0: sa 'dzin @157b don blo mnga' ba yon tan bsags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-1: yon tan tshogs dang rin po che'i me //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-2: 'jig rten 'das dpa' 'jig rten zla ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-3: dbyangs snyan tshangs pa'i tog dang tshogs can gtso //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-4: sengge'i stabs dang drag shul byin pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-5: chos kyi dbang phyug gzi 'od 'od zer che //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-6: rin chen grags pa tshogs can gsal ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-7: grags pa mtha' yas 'od zer don yod dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-8: lha'i drang srong skye dbang dge 'dun brtan /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-10: chos kyi blo gros rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-11: legs bsams grags pa snang ldan lha tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-12: yon tan bsrung don blo gros bsnyengs pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-13: grogs brtan dang ni 'od gnas mtshungs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-14: nor zhabs thar ba'i gzi brjid ngos bzang dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-15: glo bzang dang ni kun tu gzi brjid dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-16: ye shes mchog ma dang ni tshangs pa gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-17: bden pa gsung dang blo bzangs stobs byin dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-18: seng stabs me tog tog dang shes 'byung gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-19: me tog byin dang yon tan snying po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-20: rin chen grags pa rmad du byung ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-21: mi tshugs bsnyengs med nyi ma'i 'od dag dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-22: tshangs gshegs lha'i mthu rtsal ye shes dgyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-23: lha bden nor bu'i snying po yon tan grags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-24: ye shes dpal dang bcings pa med pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:157b-25: brtul shugs brtan dang lha'i gzi brjid dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-0: tshangs thub dal bzhud brtul shugs @158a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-15: zla 'od glog sbyin dab zhir gshegs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-16: mi 'khrugs pa dang dgra bcom grags pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-17: chos kyi yon tan zhing bzang bkod rgyal po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-18: mngon par 'phags dang sbyin bsreg 'od 'phro dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-19: pad dpal rin chen bkod dang shin du bzang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-20: rin chen mchog dang thugs ni shin tu gzhungs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-21: rgya mtshos byin dang tshangs pa'i tog dang zla gdugs 'od 'phro dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-22: dri med rgyal po ye shes grags pa kun rgyal yon tan 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-23: sgra grags zla rgyal padma'i 'od zer brtul shugs bzang po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158a-24: sgron rgyal glog gi tog tang 'od zer rgyal po skar mkhan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-0: grags pa rdzogs ldan padma'i snying po rgyal dang spyan @158b mdzes dang //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-3: skye dbang mtshungs dang me tog tog dang sgra gcan 'dzin sman che //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-4: rgyu skar rgyal po sman rgyal bsod nams glang po gcod mdzad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-5: rnam grags rgyal po nyi 'od chos mdzod blo gros bzang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-7: legs gnas blo sbyangs tshangs dbyangs yon tan mchog dang 'brug sgra dbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-8: mngon shes tog dang tog 'od dag pa tshangs pa skyes mchog dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-9: spyan sdug pa dang klus byin bden pa'i tog dang brgyan pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-10: zhum pa med dbyangs rin chen 'od dang tshangs byin sengge dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-11: 'od zer sna tshogs ye shes dpa' bo pad phung me tog rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-12: mthu rtsal stobs dang bsod nams phung po gzugs mchog skar mkhan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-13: zla sgron gzi brjid phung po byang chub rgyal po mi zad pa //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:158b-15: gzi brjid tshim mdzad shes rab byin dang mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-3: thub gsal zla ba'i 'od zer gser gyi 'od dang legs byin lha'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-4: yon tan dbang po chos gdugs bsod nams lag dang chags med dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-5: ye shes gya nom blo zhim gzi byin thams cad pa rtsi sman //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-6: rnam grol tog dang 'od mdzad ye shes rgyal po 'jigs mdzad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-7: chu bo spod dang thogs med grags pa bden phur dbyangs snyan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-8: ri dbang mtshungs dang chos brtsegs thar pa'i gzi brjid legs mdzad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-9: rab zhi'i sku dang yid 'od gsung blo sbyangs dang chu lha dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-10: 'gros mchod sengge'i legs dang chos kyi mthu rtsal skal bzang po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-11: mi 'khrugs mdog dang gzi brjid rgyal po rtogs mdzad spyan legs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-12: don gnas blo dang snang ba'i 'od zer spos gzi kun dga' mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-13: don yod gshegs dang khro ba bcom dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-15: rab sbyin grags dang 'od gcang lha'i nyi ma shes rab byin //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-17: gser mchog rnam grol gtsug dang chos ldan dang ni spos gnas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159a-18: dregs spangs ye shes mdzod dang tshangs par gshegs dang tsandan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-0: mya ngan med dang @159b sengge'i 'od zer yul 'khor tog par snying //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-1: gzi brjid mtha' yas lha 'od shes rab me tog mkhas pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-2: ye shes 'byor ldan tshangs dbyig phyag na rin chen dbang ldan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-3: rdzogs par gsung dang mchog gsung mchod 'os skar rgyal nyi ma dang //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-5: phan bzhed ye shes ldan grags 'od zer dra ba rnam bcom dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-6: bee d'urya snying me tog lha rgya ba zla ba dran 'od dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-7: dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-8: rin po che yi dpal dang skyes bu za ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-9: sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i 'od dang 'jig rten dag gi mchog /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-14: bcu pad ro dpag med rgyal ba zhes kyang bya //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-16: dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags mchog tu mdzes par gshegs //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:159b-19: bsnyengs pa dang ni bral ba ye shes bzheng pa dang //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:160a-7: mthu yi dpal dang 'phags pa dgyes dang mthu stobs dang //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:160a-10: yon tan phung po dang ni bcu pa gsal ba yin //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:160a-12: mchod sbyin nga ro shes rab rnam 'god nga ro dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:160a-13: yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid drang srong dbang po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:160a-14: blo ldan spobs pa'i tshogs dang bcu pa mchod sbyin bzang //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:160b-16: spyod pa'i stegs dang lha mang dag gis snyan bsgrags pa //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:160b-21: phan ldan gshegs dang bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:161a-0: dbyangs kyis bskul dang goo ta mi @161a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:162a-0: nam mkha'i dbyangs dang lha dang lha rgyal @162a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-0: grong khyer bsod nams 'byor dang ldan @193a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-1: zhes bya; ;de yi rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-2: dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni mya ngan med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-3: dga' ba rgya mtsho zhes bya yum yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-4: sras ni yid gzhungs legs byin rim gro ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-5: ye shes yang dag 'phags pa mkhas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-6: bsod nams dga' zhes bya brdzu 'phrul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-7: 'dus pa dang por bye ba phrag stong yod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-8: gnyis par bye brgyad gsum par bye ba bdun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-9: sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgyad bcu ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-10: lnga gyur dag tu dam pa'i chos gyang gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-11: rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-12: skad cig de la bde bar gshegs pa de'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-13: mtshan ni gang dag nyan par bye ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-14: byang chub la ni myur du reg par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od 'phro yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-16: skye ba'i yul ni grong khyer sman ces bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-17: rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-18: dpag tshad bcu yod yul 'khor bzang po yab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-19: mya ngan med ldan yum yin grags pa sras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-20: mdzes dang ldan zhes bya ba rim gro ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-21: tog mkhas thos rig rab gsal rdzu 'phrul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-22: 'dus pa dang por bye stong brgyad bcu ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-23: gnyis par bye stong bdun bcu rtsa brgyad yod; ;'dus pa gsum par bye stong bdun bcu lnga //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-24: mi rnams dag gi tshe lo bye ba phrag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-25: stong du nang ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193a-26: dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bdun bcu gsum //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-0: gnas @193b 'gyur 'jig rten sgron mdzad pa po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-1: grags pa mtha' yas de yi sku gdung dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-2: rnam par rgyas bdag tu 'gyur ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-3: bde bar gshegs pa tshangs pas byin pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-4: skye yul grong khyer dga' ba sgrogs shes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-5: rgyal bde yi rigs ni bram ze yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-6: 'od ni dpag tshad bdun bcu rtsa drug yod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-7: tshangs pa yab yin yum ni tshangs bla ma //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-8: sras po dga' byed rim gro na tshod bzang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-9: zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-10: sbyin pa sgrogs shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-11: 'dus pa dang por dgra bcom pa yi tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-12: bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-13: gnyis par bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu drug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-14: gsum bar bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-15: rgyal ba de yi sku tshe'i lo grangs ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-16: stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis dag tu 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-17: dam pa'i chos kyang lo grangs bye bar gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-18: sku gdung mchod rten gcig gcig 'byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-20: skye yul grong khyer bzang po zhos kyang bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-21: 'od kyi tshad ni dpag tshad drug bcu yod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-22: sman pa yab yin yum ni zla nyi bzang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-23: rin chen mchog ma zhes bya sras yin la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-24: rim gro pa ni blo gros bzang po yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-25: mthong dga' mkhas pa zla brdzu 'phrul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-26: de yi 'dus pa dang bor khri phrag gcig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-27: gnyis par drug bcu rtsa drug gsum par ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-28: drug bcu tham pa rgyal de'i sku tshe'i tshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:193b-29: lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa yang gnyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-2: de yi sku gdung dag kyang rgyas 'gyur zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-3: de ni dpal gyis rgyas par gyur pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-4: ri dgas khyu mchog sengge'i stangs gshegs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-5: de yi sku gdung rnams la'ang mchod par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-6: ston pa lha yi me tog skye ba'i yul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-7: grong khyer me tog gdugs shes bya ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-8: rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-9: dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa gnyis blo bzangs yab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-10: yum ni bde ldan sras po skye dbang yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-11: snying po mdzod 'chad rim gro pa yang yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-12: zla mchog skye bos mchod 'gyur zhes can de; ;zla 'od ces bya rdzu 'phrul can yang yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-13: 'dus pa dang bor bye ba brgya phrag gsum //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-14: gnyis par bye ba brgya phrag gnyis gsum par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-15: bye ba brag brgya sku tshe'i lo grangs ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-16: khri phrag stong yin sum gyur dam chos gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-17: 'dren pa yi ni mchod rten gcig 'byung la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-18: de la gang dag skyes pa bud med rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-19: bstod mchog mchod pa rgya chen byed de dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-20: byang chub mchog rab la ni reg par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa don lags sems pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-22: skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams rab gsal yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-23: rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-24: nyi shu rtsa gnyis bsod nams bzang po yab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194a-25: dad pa can zhes bya ba yum yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-0: rnam 'phrul sras yin @194b dge ba rim gro pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-1: rgya mtsho'i mdzod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-2: bsod nams stobs shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-3: 'dus pa dang por khri phrag bcu yod la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-4: gnyis par brgyad khri gsum par drug khri yod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-5: ma ni rnams dag gi tshe tshad lo grangs ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-6: brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi tham sta de'i yab yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-7: de yi dam chos lo grangs stong phrag ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-8: dgu bcu rtsa gnyis par du gnas 'gyur la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-9: srid pa mthar mdzad grangs pa mtha' yas de'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-10: sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas bdag tu 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-12: skye ba'i yul ni blo'i tog ces bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-13: rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-14: dpag tshad bcu yong yab ni legs byin yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-15: mkhas pa'i nga ro zhes bya yum yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-16: bsod nams can sras legs dga' rim gro ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-17: shes rab can gyi mchog dang rdzu 'phrul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-18: shin tu mthong zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-19: tshogs 'dus dang po bye ba sum bcu gnyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:194b-20: gnyis par bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gcig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-1: blun po 'dam bying mkhas pa thang la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-2: gang dag chos spyod pa ni de la bzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-3: de bas rigs pa can min spang bya zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-4: gang dag shes yul rigs ldan sten par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-5: dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-6: ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni rnal 'byor bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-7: sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran pa yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-8: bskal ba khri phrag tshad med bzod byas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-9: sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med smos ci dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-10: de bas sdug bsngal nyam thag dang du longs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-11: bzod dang ting 'dzin dag gi go bgos la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-12: brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta zhon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-13: sbyin stobs shes rab mda' yis bdud bcom ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-14: pham byas byang chub dag la reg par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-15: byams pa'i grogs dang sgrub pa'i bshes gnyen dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-16: dbyer med pha rol phyin pa spro byad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-17: stong pa'i gnas bcas shugs kyi zas bsten tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan thob par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-19: de bas ji skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-20: bag dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyong bar gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-21: mkha' la ngang pa skad 'byin dga' ba ltar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-22: thams cad mkhyen pa myur du thog par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:543b-23: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-0: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na da @544a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-1: bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor ther 'bum rnyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-3: de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa na de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig byung bas thos nas des btsun mo stong dang sras stong la smras pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-4: ting nge 'dzin zad par snang ba 'di'i don kyang mi shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-5: ma shes pas rtogs par byar yang mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-6: de lta yin gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa la bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-7: bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs shing bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba byas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-8: de dag rjes su yi rang ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-9: mong la skal pa brgyad khrir 'khor ba bsnyil nas de las kha phyir phyogs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-10: khyim can zhes bya ba'i gzugs kyang thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-11: byang chub ji skad bstan pa la'ang the tshom med par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba des na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-13: sangs rgyas sum 'bum dag mnyes par byas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544a-14: thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-0: mi khom dag tu nam @544b yang ltung bar ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-1: rgyu de kho nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-2: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-3: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-4: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-7: bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na sras stong du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-9: de ltar rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mthu che ba yin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-12: sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-13: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-14: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba'i khor 'bum snyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-15: de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bas khang bzang gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-16: tsandan dmar po'i chus btab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-17: aa ga ru'i bdugs pas bdugs pa zhig phul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:544b-18: longs spyad pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-0: de kho na dang 'dra ba zhig phul bar gyur @545a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-1: to; ;de dag thams cad la'ang bskyed mos tshal re re'ang phul bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-2: des bcom ldan 'das de las ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di yang thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi rim gro pa mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog shes rab rdzogs zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de la des 'di skad du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-4: 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shes par bya na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-5: khyim na gnas pas ni 'di rtogs par dka' yis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-6: ci nas kyang bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya ba gor chag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-8: de nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sras khri dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-9: btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa dag zhus pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-10: bcom ldan 'das des de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-11: ting nge 'dzin 'di zhag bdun gyi bar du rgya cher yang dag par bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-12: de dag gis thos nas kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545a-13: kye ma ting nge 'dzin ni mthong bar dka' mod kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-0: 'on kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di legs par bris te bcang @545b bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-2: de dag thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di bris nas kyang mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-5: de nas de dag thams cad dus las 'das nas slar de dag tshegs par gyur pas sangs rgyas drug 'bum mnyes par byas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-6: thams cad du ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-7: thams cad du rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-8: smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas thams cad kyis byang chub rab tu thob gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-9: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-10: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni ;dge slong rim gro ba shes rab rdzogs zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-14: gang dag sras khri po de dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-15: bskal pa 'di nas gzung ste bskal pa drug cu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:545b-16: de'i 'og tu bskal pa grags pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-0: bskal pa gcig po de la de @546a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-1: dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-2: gang dag blon po brgyad khri po de dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-3: bskal pa grags pa chen po 'das nas bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-4: de'i 'og tu bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-5: de la blon po brgyad khri po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-6: bskal pa skar ma lta bu 'das nas bskal pa gsum brgyar sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-7: de'i 'og tu bskal pa yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-8: de la btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-9: mchod tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-10: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-11: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa lus dang srog la mi lta bar gyur pas ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'od pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rnal @546b 'byor du bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-2: sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer ba gang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-3: de dag rgyal po de yi rjes su slob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-4: yang dag sgrub la gnas pa ma gtogs par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-5: gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ni 'thob mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-6: de ltar 'di ni dang pa chud bskyed kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-7: de bzhin rnam smin gya nom thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-8: de bas g-yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-9: 'dir ni ci rigs bkur stis rnal 'byor gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-10: rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir bsgrags pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-11: de dag gang zhig mthong bar 'dod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-12: bstan pa rgya cher 'chad par 'dod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-13: ji skad bstan bzhin 'di la rnal 'byor gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-14: yi rang nyid kyis phun sum tshogs 'gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-15: 'chang dang klog pa lta zhig ci smos te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-16: yon tan mtha' ni 'gro bas bsam mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-17: 'di thos su zhig rnal 'byor sbyor mi byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-18: byang chub so so yang dag rig mtshan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-19: ston dang pha rol sems ni gleng ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-20: sgrub dang snang ba gang dag sangs rgyas chos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-21: ting nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-22: las sbyong de bzhin bdud rnams 'joms pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:546b-23: lta sbyong de bzhin sred pa zad byed dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-0: rnam par rol dang zhing bkod 'byor @547a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-2: 'di dang rab tu ldan la dkon ma yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-3: de bzhin rnam grol spobs pa phun tshogs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-4: bya ba thams cad spyod byed gzungs dag dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-5: bsam pa ji bzhin byang chub 'tshang rgya ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-6: de dag thams cad 'dir gnas mod pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-7: nga yis de snyed tshig gis brjod nus rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-8: de lta bas na de dag 'dir sgrubs shig //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-9: kun mkhyen chos la dga' bar ma byes na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-10: phyi dus dag na 'gyod par gyur ta re //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-11: pha rol phyin pa ji snyed ngas bstan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-12: gang dag ye shes rgya mtsho sbyor lam dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-13: lus rten byis pa'i spyod la gnas pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-14: shes bar bya ba rab tu nus ma yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-15: dus ngan pa dang sems can ma rungs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-16: chos nub mtha' dang ngan song 'phel ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-17: mkhas pas shin tu yid byung byas zhes kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-18: bag yod ri dvagas bzhin du skrag par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-19: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547a-20: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis bskal pa stong du thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag la spyad pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-0: ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyis phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po @547b snga ma des rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar me 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-1: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-2: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-3: lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i tshogs brgyad 'bum snyed kyang rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-4: lha de dag chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag me tog gis chal bar bkram par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug du g-yos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-6: bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga sgra dag bsgrags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-7: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba snyed thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:547b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:548a-3: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:548a-4: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:548a-5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidya ka ra singha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:548a-6: lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-047-001:548a-7: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa /
